episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses the impact of recent bank failures on mortgage rates and offers creative financing strategies like seller buy downs and adjustable rate mortgages to help buyers in a high-rate environment. He emphasizes the importance of client engagement through events and partnerships with mortgage professionals to enhance business growth.
